front.title: Mobile Node Agnostic Fast Handovers for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: Proxy Mobile IPv6 (PMIPv6) is a mobile node agnostic mobilitymanagement protocol, that is, a mobile node does not implement anymobility management protocol. This document proposes an enhancementto PMIPv6 protocol in order to improve layer 3 handover performanceand to transfer context borrowing some ideas from Fast Handovers forMobile IPv6 (FMIPv6) protocol. In predictive mode, the previousmobile access gateway (PMAG) transfers context to the next MAG (NMAG)using Handover Indication (HI) message, while in reactive mode, NMAGuses Fast Binding Update (FBU) to request context from PMAG. A bi-directional tunnel is established between PMAG and NMAG to transferpackets during handover.
